website_summaries.verdict: The best budget air quality monitor with a unique, wearable design for on-the-go monitoring.
pros: High quality air monitor detects large and small harmful particulates while in outdoor environments
Included app makes it easy to track quality on-the-go around you
Portable and lightweight, weighing less than 1 lb
cons: Three-hour battery life is too short for all-day use

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product to gaurd your health against air pollution
customer_reviews.text: It has a very fast response to changes in PM 2.5 and a well-designed iPhone application. I used a hand vac in another room of my home and instantly the sensor indicates the particle count has moved to the unhealthy range. I have an electrostatic filter in my central HVAC system and this unit can detect when the HVAC blower is on and removing particles vs when the blower is off. With the dangers of air pollution well documented by WHO, this device should be used everyone who wants to have a healthy environment. I had to contact their support organization about a minor issue and they were extremely responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Richard295

customer_reviews.title: Battery is craptastic
customer_reviews.text: I like the little device and what it tells me. It's not as good as the one from England, but acceptable. The primary trouble is, the battery only lasts until about lunchtime, then it will only come on for about 1 - 2 minutes at a time the rest of the day. I don't know if this is by design or not, but it really sucks. I want to constantly monitor the air I breath, not pull that thing out to check the air and then put it away.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher D. Catron

customer_reviews.title: This device is awesome! It is an extremely sensitive air quality sensor ...
customer_reviews.text: This device is awesome! It is an extremely sensitive air quality sensor with a fantastic app for your phone. It has a light on it that indicates the air quality in your vicinity in real time. It also indicates this more precisely on the app, based on PM. Its great to see how the air quality is wherever you go and to make any adjustments (open a window, move work locations) lessen your exposure. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Pelton

customer_reviews.title: Highly accurate sensor.
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweighted and portable sensor. Yet, giving highly accurate air quality score. I have another sensor from another company and the 2 indicators give almost most similar air quality score.
customer_reviews.author: Tri Tran

customer_reviews.title: Very nice unit, seems really responsive but for a wearable ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice unit, seems really responsive but for a wearable device the battery life of three hours is much too short for continuous operation. The only way to use is turning it on and off routinely unless it’s plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: George Z

customer_reviews.title: Help!  How do you set it up?
customer_reviews.text: They did not include any instructions on how to set this up. How arrogant! A little help would be appreciated. I am sure it is a good product but I do not want to do business with a company that treat their customers like that.
customer_reviews.author: Marion Hatland

customer_reviews.title: Not there yet.. unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately had to return as measurements were completely off with a huge variance. Would have loved for this to work as its a great idea. Would buy again once its proven to be more reliable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wynd Wearable is compact and accurate
customer_reviews.text: This wearable air quality instrument is truly small and accurate. It corresponds closely to the national readings in my area. I wear it while walking 5 miles daily, and it is so small and lite that it can be attached anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: David Chaney

customer_reviews.title: Has not worked Accurately so far
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to work for a day...reads radically different than what the map of air quality reads. Have only had one volley with tech support. Yes I reset it....just so far my experience.
customer_reviews.author: North CA Fan

customer_reviews.title: Auido alarm needed
customer_reviews.text: The lack of some auido alarm via phone is a problem. One can not be looking at the thing all the time.
customer_reviews.author: monty hancock

customer_reviews.title: It's great! It gave me an answer for my health ...
customer_reviews.text: It's great! It gave me an answer for my health issues. Went to the doctor and found out I have asthma. I will be buying an air purifier next :)
customer_reviews.author: Roserafini

customer_reviews.title: reliable and easy to understand
customer_reviews.text: I have a lung condition and air quality is very important to me. I have neighbors who burn wood and I need a reliable way to measure my air before I go outside. This is a great little device to do that. The app is user friendly too.
customer_reviews.author: BK in the NW

customer_reviews.title: Only instantaneous mode, no graph to show quality over time and no notifications
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't track readings over time, no alerts, not too useful
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: I love knowing quickly if I need to get out of ...
customer_reviews.text: I love knowing quickly if I need to get out of a place! I would love it if we could save the data and have graphs etc. This was today. First one in a restaurant. Second outside and third in a Grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: cry

customer_reviews.title: App Does Not Allow Sign Up
customer_reviews.text: The app does not allow you to press the sign up button. I’ve tried to close the app, delete and reboot it, etc. with no luck. I even tried the only other alternative route to sign up using Facebook which also crashes and fails. Device is useless if you cannot access the data.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: User friendly portable air quality monitor
customer_reviews.text: I like that this tells me the air quality. I now know places to avoid. Small and easy to carry around. Seems accurate based on areas I’ve tested -see pix. I don’t know how to figure out the breakdown of what’s in the air though. And I think it only goes up to 500. But I definitely recommend!! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tami, Brooklyn Mom

customer_reviews.title: ... see you to be working very well and I like it.
customer_reviews.text: So far see you to be working very well and I like it .
customer_reviews.author: gilbertalves

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! So easy to sync up and immediately start ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! So easy to sync up and immediately start monitoring your air quality! With the fires in California this week, being able to monitor changing air quality conditions both indoors and out is key! Thank you Wynd for this awesome device!
customer_reviews.author: Teverde

product_meta.title: Wynd Wearable Air Quality Tracker (Black Matte)
feature_bullets: MONITORS AIR QUALITY: Tracker samples air continuously and measures the level of particulates in the environment, which can include both large particles (e.g., allergens) and small ones (e.g., PM2.5 from the burning of fuel or industrial processes). The free EBook teaches you about air quality with in-depth information about pollen, pet dander, mold, car and industrial pollution and how they affect your health. (Download Link Emailed after Purchase)
WEARABLE: Tracker is the size of your thumb and has a clip to attach to clothing, backpacks, and other gear so it can monitor while on the go.
MOBILE APP: Pairs with mobile app to generate personalized insights about the environment and how to improve health.
PAIRS with Wynd Purifier (not included) to automatically maintain air quality by adjusting cleaning speed in response to air pollution level.
PORTABLE & LIGHTWEIGHT: Designed to weigh less than one pound so you monitor air quality anywhere: home, car, bedroom, baby strollers.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.0 out of 5 stars36 ratings3.0 out of 5 stars
